thoughts.text: Now that I have more information about the Brno Reservoir trail, I should plan my exploration of the trail. I will use the information I gathered to estimate how long it will take me to complete the trail and what I will need to bring with me.

- Determine what I will need to bring with me
- Plan my exploration of the trail
